alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Johns and southern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over World Golf Village, or 9 miles southeast of Fruit Cove, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, Durbin, Picolata, Nocatee and Bakersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
